content.text: How do I deploy my Next.js app on Fleek?
Just run `fleek deploy` and let Fleek handle the rest! ‚ö° Pro tip: make sure your repo is connected to Fleek, and enjoy the smoothest deployment experience you've ever had. #FleekDeploy
What makes Fleek different from other cloud platforms?

Fleek isn't just a cloud platform, it's an edge-optimized powerhouse üöÄ. Hosting apps on Fleek means auto-scaling, high security with TEE, and performance like no other. The future is decentralized! #FleekNet
